propositions.text: This is a story full of fantasy.
This is a world of female supremacy and male subordination, where women are the social dominant and men are in a subordinate position.
In this world, women hold power, and men are responsible for procreation and housework.
The high social status of women allows them to freely pursue their careers and ideals.
Men are expected to be gentle, obedient, and provide emotional support for women.

hierarchy.structure: The document is structured into an introduction and multiple chapters. Each chapter is further divided into sections, often marked by an '##' heading for the chapter and '###' for sub-sections. Quoted text represents direct statements or descriptions within these sections.
